prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just wanted to check in and see how your week is going.  
Don't forget about our meeting tomorrow at 3 PM. Looking forward to it!  
Your package has been shipped and is expected to arrive on Friday.  
Can you send me the recipe for that pasta dish you made last week? It was amazing!  
Just a reminder: your subscription will renew on the 15th.  
I’m running a bit late, but I’ll be there in 10 minutes!  
Thanks for helping me out with the project! I really appreciate it.  
Your bank statement for September is now available to view online.  
Hey, are we still on for dinner this Saturday? Let me know!  
Your OTP for the transaction is 123456. Please enter it to proceed.  
I hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  
Just wanted to remind you about the community meeting next week.  
Your appointment has been confirmed for Tuesday at 10 AM.  
I saw your message! Let’s catch up soon.  
Your flight to New York has been delayed by an hour.  
I finished the book you lent me; it was so good!  
Just a quick update: the event is now scheduled for next month.  
Please confirm if you received the documents I sent yesterday.  
Thanks for the invite! I’ll be there with bells on!  
I noticed a charge on your account. Please verify it when you can.  
Your friend has sent you a request to join their photo album.  
Looking forward to our coffee date next week!  
The kids are excited about the camping trip this weekend!  
Your feedback is valuable to us; thank you for taking the survey!  
Did you get a chance to look at the proposal? I’d love your input.  
Your delivery is out for delivery and should arrive by 3 PM.  
Hey, just wanted to see if you got home okay last night.  
The team is meeting on Friday to discuss the new project updates.  
I’ll pick up the groceries on my way home. Do you need anything else?  
Your password has been successfully changed.  
Don’t forget to bring your ID for the event tomorrow.  
I’ll be in the office late today; can we reschedule our call?  
Happy birthday! Hope you have a fantastic day filled with joy!  
I saw your post about the concert; would love to go with you!  
Your last payment has been processed successfully.  
I’m here if you want to talk; just let me know!  
The webinar starts in 15 minutes; don’t forget to join!  
I’ll send the presentation over by the end of the day.  
Just a heads up, there’s a sale at your favorite store this weekend!  
I hope your meeting went well today! Can’t wait to hear all about it.  
Your appointment has been canceled; please reschedule at your convenience.  
Thanks for a great weekend! Let’s do it again soon!  
Your subscription will expire in three days.  
I appreciate your quick response to my email; it really helps!  
Let me know when you’re free to discuss the new ideas.  
Your account has been flagged for unusual activity. Please review it.  
Can’t wait for our road trip next month! Planning some fun stops!  
I’ll handle the arrangements for the party, don’t worry!  
Looking forward to the game this weekend! Should be a good match!  
Your feedback has been received; thank you for your input!  
We’d love to hear your thoughts on our new service.  
Just checking in to see if you got my last message.  
Your ticket for the event is confirmed; see you there!  
I hope you’re having a great day! Just wanted to say hi!  
I finished editing the video; I’ll send it over shortly.
